title: (x) Restaurant website geometric sans - ITC Kabel {Paul Turner (self)}
content: ITC Kabel has an alternate ampersand like that. I don't know which (if any) digital version includes it, though.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: The ampersand looks like it was borrowed from [Bitstream Cooper Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054904/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/cooper/bold/testdrive.html?s=%26&p=48), but otherwise I think you are right about the type being Kabel.

Check it out:   
   
 ![itckabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69444.gif)   
   
(Sample from an old Phil's Photo catalog, typositor film font.)
